hooks.prompt: Before approving subagent completion, verify ALL code written follows commenting standards: (1) Code must be self-documenting through clear naming - no comments needed to explain WHAT code does, (2) Comments ONLY explain WHY something exists or non-obvious decisions, (3) NO changelog-style comments like 'Fix for X', 'Added because...', 'Removed old...', (4) NO commented-out code - delete it, git has history. Review the subagent's work. If ANY violation exists, return 'block' with specific file:line violations requiring fixes. Only return 'approve' if all code meets these standards.
